long_description: The Salomon XT Twin Hydration belt offers stable carry of race-day essentials and 2 water bottles. Water bottle pockets are ergonomically shaped, making access to fluids easy; included water bottles hold 20 fl. oz. each. Durable nylon fabric stands up to wear and tear; supportive mesh waistbelt is breathable to keep you cool during high-octane activities. Quick-fit belt offers easy adjustments for a custom fit. Zippered pocket is sized for keys, ID, energy snacks and other small essentials.
